text: Don t do it  Please TW I m not here to tell you that other people have it harder or guilt you for feeling the way you do  I m here to tell you I love you  I m here to tell you that you matter  Things do change and I hope you all realise this before it s too late  months ago  I was at the worst of my depression  I lived alone and no one would visit me  despite my numerous attempts to avoid being alone  Many people had voiced their hatred for me  especially my ex boyfriend who had only recently broken up with me at the time and used my love to stroke his ego  Any time I tried getting better  things got worse tenfold  Every waking moment  I spent intoxicated but the people that knew didn t show concern  After a night of extremely heavy drinking and self harming  I knew I was completely ready to do it  I called a friend of my ex boyfriend s who had remained kind to me throughout our breakup and kept it lighthearted by saying I was feeling  down  while I prepared myself We spoke about his aspirations  what he was doing with his life  how his girlfriend was  He had absolutely no idea that within   minutes  I d be ending the call and my life I ended the call and went to hang myself  and after feeling guilt for making a friend think I was okay  I decided just before losing consciousness to save my own life  I was taken to a hospital and in the hours I sat in the waiting room for my evaluation  I realised that even though no one seemed to really care  I still felt love for people I could never express it to I feel love for you  regardless of what you do with your life  because I understand how it feels to be where you are  I ve lost people I loved more than anyone to suicide  but they weren t selfish  They were hurting Don t ever be afraid to ask for help  and don t ever feel like a burden for seeking it  Getting better was the best decision I d made  and I hope you can make the decision to get better too
summary: A few months ago TW was depressed and suicidal. She called a friend of her ex-boyfriend who had been kind to her throughout their breakup. She ended the call and went to hang herself. She was taken to a hospital and got better.
cleaned: month ago depressed suicidal call friend sex boyfriend kind breakup end go hang take hospital get well
